content.text:
[b][size=25]
- The boot screen now loads faster

- Audio now plays back at the correct level

- Text now shows up in images saved from the editor

- The help button now functions as expected

content.text:
[b][size=25]
frequently asked questions

Q.  Can I save patch sheets to the app?
A. saving is not supported at this time.

Q. How can I play a patch audio clip?
A. You can hit the play button or right click on the patch image.

Q. Can I edit/contribute to the app?
A. Yes. You can view the source code on our GitHub page.

parameters: "Mobile devices are not supported at this time"

events.comment: For use with online patch loading
